msItem.title: Tadhkirat al-Salāṭīn-i Chaghatā
تذكرة السلاطين چغتای
Tadhkirat al-Salatin i Chaghata.
msItem.note: The text ends rather abruptly in the middle of a page. Part of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 100. Vol. II. From Jahangir to tbe seventh year of Muhammad Shah, A.H. 1137 (A.D. 1724). Ruled margins. Headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Bar arbab-i khibrat makhfi u muhtahab namanad

bindingDesc.p: Red leather Oriental binding, with stamped cartouches, blind-tooling and painted decoration. Although in format and page layout the MS differs from No 100 the bindings are similar in fabric and the stamp used for the central cartouche is in fact the same. Evidently the two volumes were together when the binding took place.

acquisition.p: Provenance unknown. Both Morley's catalogues are silent on this.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
